description: BR-31 is the District Transport Office (DTO) serving the Vaishali district, headquartered in the city of Hajipur. It is responsible for vehicle registrations, issuing driving licenses, and enforcing motor vehicle regulations for one of Bihar's most significant commercial and agricultural districts. Located across the Ganges from Patna, this RTO manages high volumes of traffic passing through the Mahatma Gandhi Setu, connecting North and South Bihar.
address: District Transport Office, Collectorate Building, Yadav Colony Road, Hajipur, Vaishali, Bihar
